head.supplied: 14/11/63. ¶ Dear Mr Fitzgibbon ¶ s ¶ ¶ If you intend to offer any resistance to the occupation of part of the northern reserve of the bot Garden by the highlanders, it will be necessary to do it at o...

div.p: Unit 731, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: If you intend to offer any resistance to the occupation of part of the northern reserve of the bot Garden by the highlanders, it will be necessary to do it at once & energetically, as they have commenced the survey of the locality.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
